[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_fullwidth_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/make_the_switch_hero.jpg” alt=”Make the switch – DTI drivers” title_text=”make_the_switch_hero” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin_tablet=”||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||35px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Make the Switch & Drive for Dot Transportation

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

We’re not here to sugar-coat things—you know as well as we do that being a professional truck driver is hard work. And, honestly, switching jobs can be a hassle. But driving for Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI) is a job change that’s worth the effort. Drive with us and you’ll reap the short– and long-term benefits of joining our team.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”33896″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0065a4″ min_height=”125px” custom_margin=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Apply-Now@2x.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” height_tablet=”226px” height_phone=”150px” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”25px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”8%||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Apply Today & Discover Your Forever Career

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/dotfoods?r=drivefordot” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Apply Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”13%||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0%||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0%||30px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” animation_style=”bounce” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Need More Information Before You Apply? We’d love to talk to you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Switch to Dot & You’ll Find

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/icon_calendar.svg” alt=”Schedule Consistency” title_text=”Schedule Consistency” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”13%” height=”60px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Schedule Consistency

We know the most important parts of your life happen outside of work. Since we are a private, family-owned and -operated carrier and we haul our own freight, we can provide you with the consistent home time you deserve.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Get Options

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/money_icon.svg” alt=”Competitive Pay” title_text=”Competitive Pay” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”16%” height=”60px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Competitive Pay

This job is hard work. That’s why we ensure our truck drivers get paid for every part of the job. Mileage; stop, pickup, and delivery pay; bonuses, paid time off, holidays, and more—that’s what you can expect when you drive for Dot.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Earn More

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/icon_lock_alt.svg” alt=”Job Security” title_text=”Job Security” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”13%” height=”60px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Job Security

DTI has been around for 30 years and has never laid off a single employee. Not once. We understand the importance of job stability. You rely on us so your family can rely on you—so our priority is to keep your jobs secure.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Learn More

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/money.svg” alt=”401K Match and Profit Sharing” title_text=”401K Match and Profit Sharing” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”18%” height=”60px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

401(k) Match & Profit Sharing

With our 401(k) match, profit-sharing bonuses, and other financial planning resources, you’ll be on your way to a financially secure retirement.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Retire From Dot

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/equipment.svg” alt=”Equipment” title_text=”Equipment” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”16%” height=”60px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Top-of-the-Line Equipment

At DTI, we keep our equipment up-to-date and innovative. Our late-model, automatic Volvo® and Peterbilt trucks are maintained in Dot’s garages by our in-house mechanics.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Drive the Best

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Occ-Health.svg” alt=”Occupational Health Experts” title_text=”Occupational Health Experts” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”13%” height=”60px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Occupational Health Experts

Your health and safety is our #1 priority. We have occupational health trainers and therapists assigned to every distribution center (DC).

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

See More

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ custom_margin=”100px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” height_tablet=”auto” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

“I started on the 4×4 schedule. I have a family and knowing when I’d be home and when I’d be out was really enticing to me with my first driving job. It’s good money, but for me, it’s more about getting home as often as possible. Anything I’ve needed, management and dispatch have bent over backwards to help me out.”

Jason, Maryland Driver

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Jason_Maryland.jpg” alt=”Maryland Driver” title_text=”Maryland Driver” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-124px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”8px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”8px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

An Elite Fleet of Professional Drivers

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/DotTruckBG.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”center_left” height=”350px” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” background_last_edited=”on|tablet” background_enable_image_tablet=”off” background_enable_image_phone=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” height_tablet=”300px” height_phone=”160px” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” background_last_edited=”on|tablet” background_image_tablet=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/DotTruckLeftSide.png” background_image_phone=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/DotTruckLeftSide.png” background_enable_image_tablet=”on” background_enable_image_phone=”on” background_size_phone=”contain” background_position_phone=”top_left” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|||1%|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

If you’re hired at Dot, then you know you’re one of the best drivers in the industry. Your customer service skills are impeccable. Your safety-first mindset keeps you, your customers, and other drivers safe when you’re out on the road. You take pride in your profession and are looking for a team who respects the essential products you’re hauling to all corners of the country.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider color=”#d8d8d8″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Driving for Dot is Worth It

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vs-YAs8Na5Q&list=PLSgCgI1k7vvxwW7x8QrvuypXxDpXcwqCt&index=3&t=7s” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Lori

Lori’s world revolves around her family. And Dot gives her the ability to stay family-focused. When she isn’t training other drivers, she is at home supporting her parents.

“Dot has worked with me to give me the position I need to take care of my parents. I can’t ask for anything better.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WbASWniqqUY&list=PLSgCgI1k7vvxwW7x8QrvuypXxDpXcwqCt&index=7″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Nate

Nate moved from Dot Foods California to our Chicago DC to be closer to his brother. Between Dot’s family-oriented values and their consistent schedules, Nate was able to reconnect with his brother and establish new roots in Chicago.

“Dot was very accommodating.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Nate

Nate moved from Dot Foods California to our Chicago DC to be closer to his brother. Between Dot’s family-oriented values and their consistent schedules, Nate was able to reconnect with his brother and establish new roots in Chicago.

“Dot was very accommodating.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WbASWniqqUY&list=PLSgCgI1k7vvxwW7x8QrvuypXxDpXcwqCt&index=7″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cIAU3RAYAYI&list=PLSgCgI1k7vvxwW7x8QrvuypXxDpXcwqCt&index=5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Woody

“With Dot, I feel like I’m well taken care of. When I saw that they had a four [days] on, four [days] off option, I was like, ‘I’m going to start with that’ because you can still make decent money and then still do what you like to do. It’s kind of like the best of both worlds.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider color=”#d8d8d8″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

excerpt.rendered: Make the Switch & Drive for Dot TransportationWe’re not here to sugar-coat things—you know as well as we do that being a professional truck driver is hard work. And, honestly, switching jobs can be a hassle. But driving for Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI) is a job change that’s worth the effort. Drive with us and […]
